AT.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
AT.description: Die Old-School 2D-Action mit Highspeed und Side-Scrolling, die du von Azure Striker Gunvolt kennst, ist zurück! In diesem Spiel kehrt Gunvolts Rivale, Copen, aus der ersten Ausgabe, als Spielcharakter zum Kampf zurück! Spielfunktionen: 1. Prevasion Damit kann Gunvolt gegnerische Angriffe auf Kosten seiner EP-Energie neutralisieren. Auch Copen hat diese Fähigkeit. 2. Kudos Kudos ist ein Punktesystem, dass erhöht wird, wenn du Gegnern Schaden zufügst. Wenn du Schaden erleidest, werden deine Kudos auf 0 zurückgesetzt. Bei Aktivierung eines Speicherpunkts, Nutzung einer Spezialfähigkeit oder Beenden einer Mission, werden Kudos in Bonuspunkte umgewandelt. 3. Das Musenlied Solange du 1000 oder mehr Kudos hast, ändert sich die Hintergrundmusik und Lumen aka Die Muse (Lola in Copens Geschichte) singt für dich! 4. Anthem Erreichen Gunvolts oder Copens GP 0, kann die Macht der Muse sie mit zusätzlichen Power-Ups ins Leben zurückrufen. Dabei ändert sich die Hintergrundmusik zum Musenlied.

AU.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
AU.description: The 2D high speed, old-school style side-scrolling action that you remember from Azure Striker Gunvolt is back! In this game, Gunvolt's rival Copen from the first installment returns to the fray as a playable character! Gameplay Features: 1. Prevasion This ability allows Gunvolt to neutralize enemy attacks at the cost of his EP energy. Copen also has an ability exactly like this. 2. Kudos Kudos is a point system that increases whenever you deal damage to an enemy. Whenever you take damage, your Kudos are reduced to zero. When activating a save point, using a special skill or clearing a mission, Kudos are converted into bonus points. 3. The Muse's song For as long as you can maintain 1000 or more Kudos, the BGM will change and Lumen AKA The Muse (or in Copen's story, Lola) will sing for you! 4. Anthem When Gunvolt or Copen's HP reaches 0, the Muse's power can bring them back to life, with additional power-ups. In that state, the BGM will change to the Muse's song.

BG.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
BG.description: The 2D high speed, old-school style side-scrolling action that you remember from Azure Striker Gunvolt is back! Anthem When Gunvolt or Copen's HP reaches 0, the Muse's power can bring them back to life, with additional power-ups. In that state, the BGM will change to the Muse's song.

BE.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
BE.description: Le style 2D d'action trés rapide old school que te rappelles de Azure Striker Gunvolt se retourner! Le rival de Gunvolt de premiere jeux à retourner comment un personnage jouable! Caracteristique de jeux 1. Prevasion Ce habilité permit à Gunvolt la neutralization des ataques ennemi au dépend de su energie EP. Copen à aussi une habileté exactement comme ca. 2. Kudos Kudos est une système des points qui augmente quand tu vous endommager ennemies. Lorsque vous êtes endommagé les Kudos seront réduit à zéro. Activation d’un point de sauvegarde, utilization d’une habilité spéciale ou la finition d’une mission convertit les Kudos en points bonus. 3. La chanson de la muse Tandis que tient 1000 Kudos ou plus, le musique change et Lumen, La Muse, (Lola par Copen) chante pour toi! 4. Anthem (hymne) Quand le HP de Gunvolt ou Copen atteindre zéro, le pouvoir de la Muse les peut ranimer avec des pouvoirs additionnelle. Dans cette etat la musique ça change à musique de la Muse.

ES.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
ES.description: Lo estilo 2D de acción muy rápido de la vuela escuela que te recuerdas de Azure Striker Gunvolt está de vuelta! El rival de Gunvolt del primero juego, Copen retorna à lucha como un personaje jugable! Características del juego 1. Prevásion Esta habilidad permite à Gunvolt neutralizar los ataques inimigos a custa de su energía EP. Copen también tiene una habilidad exactamente como essa. 2. Kudos Kudos eres un sistema de puntos qué aumenta cuando danãs los inimigos. Cuando recibes daño tus kudos son reducidos a cero. Activando un punto de guardado, utilizando una habilidad especial o terminando una misión, los Kudos serán convertidos en puntos bonus. 3. La canción de la musa Mientras mantienes 1000 Kudos o más, la música cambiará y Lumen, también conocida como La Musa, (para Copen será Lola) canta para usted! 4. Anthem (Himno) Cuando los HP de Gunvolt o Copen alcanzan cero, lo poder de la Musa puede los revivir con poderes adicionales utilizando la música de la Musa.

IT.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
IT.description: Il gioco d'azione 2D ad alta velocità e a scorrimento laterale vecchia scuola che tanto hai amato con Azure Striker Gunvolt è tornato! Il rivale di Gunvolt, Copen, ritorna come personaggio giocabile per unirsi alla lotta! Caratteristiche: 1. Prevasion Questa abilità permette a Gunvolt di neutralizzare gli attacchi nemici utilizzando la sua energia EP. Anche Copen ha la stessa abilità. 2. Kudos I Kudos sono punti che aumentano ogni volta che infliggi dei danni al nemico e che si riducono ogni volta che li ricevi. Quando attivi un punto di salvataggio, usi un'abilità speciale o completi una missione, i Kudos si trasformano in punti bonus. 3. Il canto della Musa Se mantieni un punteggio di 1.000 o più Kudos la musica cambia e Lumen, alias La Musa (Lola per Copen), canta per te! 4. Anthem (Inno) Quando gli HP di Gunvolt o Copen scendono a 0, il potere della Musa li riporta in vita con potenziamenti aggiuntivi. In questo stato la musica cambierà diventando il canto della Musa.

Anthem When Gunvolt or Copen's HP reaches 0, the Muse's power can bring them back to life, with additional power-ups. In that state, the BGM will change to the Muse's song.

NL.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
NL.description: De 2D, razendsnelle, oude stijl, side-scrolling actie die je je herinnert van Azure Striker Gunvolt is terug! Gunvolts tegenstander Copen uit het eerste spel is terug als speelbaar personage! Spelfuncties: 1. Prevasion Gunvolt kan met dit vermogen aanvallen van vijanden afweren door zijn EP-energie te gebruiken. Copen heeft een soortgelijk vermogen. 2. Kudos Kudos is een puntensysteem; iedere keer als je een vijand schade toebrengt verdien je punten. Als je schade oploopt, verlies je al je Kudos. Als je een opslagpunt activeert, speciaal vermogen gebruikt of een missie voltooit, worden de Kudos omgezet in bonuspunten. 3. Het lied van de Muse Als je 1000 of meer Kudos hebt zal de achtergrondmuziek veranderen en zal Lumen oftewel De Muse (of in Copens verhaal, Lola) voor je zingen! 4 Anthem Als de HP van Gunvolt of Copen op 0 staat, kan de kracht van de Muse hen terugbrengen van de dood, met extra Power-ups. In die situatie zal de achtergrondmuziek vanderen in het lied van de Muse.

NZ.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
NZ.description: The 2D high speed, old-school style side-scrolling action that you remember from Azure Striker Gunvolt is back! PT.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
PT.description: O estilo old-school de ação rápida 2D que te lembras de Azure Striker Gunvolt está de volta! O rival de Gunvolt do primeiro jogo, Copen, retorna como um personagem jogável! Características do jogo: 1. Prevasion Esta habilidade permite que Gunvolt neutralize os ataques inimigos ao custo da sua energia EP. Copen tem uma habilidade exactamente como essa. 2. Kudos Kudos é um sistema de pontos que aumenta quando danificas inimigos. Ao receber dano os teus Kudos são reduzidos a zero. Quando ativas um ponto de guarda, utilizas uma habilidade especial ou completas uma missão, os Kudos são convertidos em pontos bónus. 3. A canção da Musa Enquanto mantiveres 1000 ou mais Kudos, a música altera e Lumen, também conhecida como A Musa (Lola, no caso de Copen), cantará para ti! 4. Anthem Quando o HP de Gunvolt ou Copen's chegar a zero, o poder da Musa pode reanimá-los com poderes adicionais. Nesse estado, a música altera para a canção da Musa.

RU.name: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2
RU.description: The 2D high speed, old-school style side-scrolling action that you remember from Azure Striker Gunvolt is back! In this game, Gunvolt's rival Copen from the first installment returns to the fray as a playable character! Gameplay Features: 1. Prevasion This ability allows Gunvolt to neutralize enemy attacks at the cost of his EP energy. Copen also has an ability exactly like this. 2. Kudos Kudos is a point system that increases whenever you deal damage to an enemy. Whenever you take damage, your Kudos are reduced to zero. When activating a save point, using a special skill or clearing a mission, Kudos are converted into bonus points. 3. The Muse's song For as long as you can maintain 1000 or more Kudos, the BGM will change and Lumen AKA The Muse (or in Copen's story, Lola) will sing for you! 4. Anthem When Gunvolt or Copen's HP reaches 0, the Muse's power can bring them back to life, with additional power-ups. In that state, the BGM will change to the Muse's song.
